channel.title: first on floork
channel.description: Recent content in first on floork

item.title: My Homepage
item.description: In this Post I want to talk about the creation of this Homepage Static Site Generator To create this site I used the Static Site Generator, originally I wanted to use Jekyll, but I haven’t really found a theme that I liked. So instead I switched to Hugo where I found PaperMod and later PaperModX which is a really nice theme. Hosting To host this Website originally I used Github Pages, but since I wanted to test Netlify i thought why not use it to host the website and so I did.

item.title: MyShell
item.description: This is my personal Shell install Script featuring BASH, FISH and Zsh + the Starship prompt! –> MyShell git clone https://github.com/floork/my_shell cd my_shell ./install.sh
